programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Double Amputee’s Inspiring Ride
programme.desc: Three years after his double amputation, Jeff in Albuquerque is ready to reconnect with nature. Kinga is there to root him on as he takes on challenging and inspiring outdoor adventures.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Band Brings Smile Back To Friend With Cerebral Palsy
programme.desc: This story will put a smile on your face. The team helps one of their dearest friends get his greatest wish: a brand new smile.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Who's Got The Sauce?
programme.desc: Chef Aaron Poret of Bywater American Bistro goes head to head with Chef Jas Rogers, Owner and Creator of Saucex Dat. Will fried dough foil Chef Poret’s chances of success, or will he rise to Chef Rogers’ challenge?

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Ballin' in Baltimore: Baseball Legend Ryan Ripken Pitches Angel a Day of Iconic Institutions
programme.desc: Angel joins baseball legend, Ryan Ripken, for a home run day, exploring the best of Baltimore. They bat 100 at Ripken Stadium, learn about sea life at the National Aquarium, crush indoor rock climbing and show down in an epic cook-off.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Pike County Massacre
programme.desc: After eight members of one family were killed in their homes in a single night, residents of the devastated Ohio community were left to wonder if they were next.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate it, Pittsburgh!: Between The Bread
programme.desc: In honor of Pittsburgh's love of handhelds, Chef Claudy Pierre and Chef Alex Brown get creative crafting their best sandwich-inspired dishes.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Driven to Kill: The Twisted Plot to Murder a Florida Doctor
programme.desc: In a serene community, a beloved doctor is bludgeoned in her own home. Investigators uncover a conspiracy that rocks the close-knit neighborhood to its core​​.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Abita Springs, LA
programme.desc: Dare yourself to jump out of a plane and drink beer made from miraculous waters.

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.desc: Runner-in-Chief, Jeff Dengate spotlights inspiring runners making a difference.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Sunshine & Sand in Seaside, FL
programme.desc: All-American hot dogs, a selfie museum, and ‘The Truman Show’ filming locations.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: All across this country, people are stepping up to help their communities in big and small ways. From nurses, veterans and firefighters, to teachers, neighbors, and strangers, every community has a hero.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Cristina Quackenbush of Milkfish takes on Chef Jennifer Cole of Laurel Oak in a blindfold battle of international influences! They may not have matched on a dating app, but in the kitchen it’s a match-up for the ages.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A Missouri community seeks answers when two young women disappear a decade apart

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Ballin' in Baltimore: Activist Nyki Robinson Intros Angel to Baltimore's Most Impactful Changemakers
programme.desc: Angel partners with Black Girls Vote founder, Nyki Robinson, to celebrate Baltimore's brightest Black changemakers. They spotlight a mission-driven clothing brand, a celebrated restaurant, powerful art and an incredible urban farm.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Date Night Delights
programme.desc: Chefs Jason Taylor and Adam Stayrook will have to chef to impress in today’s Date Night Delights challenge. Will their fancy meals delight the judges? Or will this be a date they wanna forget?

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.sub-title: What's On The Menu, Baltimore? Seafood Feast
programme.desc: Crab, oyster, shrimp...check, check, check! Find out why Baltimore's seafood scene reigns supreme as we explore all the underwater offerings this Chesapeake city has to offer.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.sub-title: FIXT: New Dad Is Done Feeling Ashamed of His Smile
programme.desc: Danny’s a family man now and needs to upgrade his smile, damaged by past drug use. But he’s been burned by dentists before. Tattoo artist Craig claims that no one’s been able to give him teeth he won’t break. Will their faith in dentists be restored?

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Be the Captain of Your Own Adventure in Mount Dora, FL
programme.desc: Where else can you pilot your own catamaran before ordering up a slice of sushi pizza? If that’s not enough, you can also spend the night in a cozy barn, enjoy a cocktail at Funky Monkey and savor the mystery at Magical Meat Boutique.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Fundraising Scams
programme.desc: Crimes exploiting online generosity are a growing trend. These real-life stories show people going to great lengths to con unsuspecting donors out of their money.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Bold Blogger Dueling It Out For Love
programme.desc: Lifestyle blogger Morgan is ready to find her special someone. Three Des Moines bachelors try to capture her heart one date at a time. Will it be by getting creative, using a good offense or will she roll into love on wheels?

programme.title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.desc: A powerful look at the history of Native American boarding schools as told through the stories of tribal members and their surviving family members, who endured an educational system founded on the concept “Kill the Indian in him, and save the man.”

programme.title: Game On: Fight for the Kings
programme.desc: Game On: Fight for the Kings is a KCRA 3 documentary with never-before-heard stories of the four-month fight, the friendships garnered between the rival cities, and Sacramento doing the unimaginable: winning the battle for the Kings.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: In this game show, comedian Frank Nicotero hits the streets to ask people questions inspired by the wildest news stories for a chance at winning a cash prize. These real-life stories with unreal outcomes will make you say, “Wait, What Happened?"

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Mo Gaba: Spirit Lives Forever
programme.desc: How a child living with cancer changed the Baltimore sports community forever.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.desc: Maker Nation

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Missing Link in the Mardi Gras Murders
programme.desc: The brutal murders of two trans women of color just 48 hours apart in New Orleans unsettle the community, leaving many wondering if the cases are connected. Detectives uncover clues, yet justice remains elusive.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.desc: No one knows a city like the locals who live there. This series taps into the insider knowledge of notable figures including musicians, athletes, chefs, artists, influencers, and others who share their best spots to hit up in the city.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Key Bridge Disaster: Reflect, Recover, Rebuild
programme.desc: "Key Bridge Disaster: Reflect, Recover, Rebuild," examines the lives impacted in the hours, days and months following the collapse, telling the stories of first responders, workers at the Port of Baltimore, business owners and employees, and the people living in nearby communities.

programme.title: Juvenile Lifers: Road to Redemption
programme.desc: (2019) Juvenile Lifers: Road to Redemption focuses on people who were sentenced to life in prison as juveniles. WGAL News 8's Matt Barcaro examines how these these former offenders are re-entering society and the reaction from victims' families.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Driven to Kill: The Twisted Plot to Murder a Florida Doctor
programme.desc: In a serene community, a beloved doctor is bludgeoned in her own home. Investigators uncover a conspiracy that rocks the close-knit neighborhood to its core​​.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Caring Crusader Enjoys Paw-tastic Surprises at Every Turn
programme.desc: Scott's life revolves around everyone's favorite four-legged friends, from rescuing and caring for countless dogs, his spirit is unwavering. Today Meaghan gives back a day full of moments for him and his beloved canine companion.
